snippet: News from the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons and testimony at a House hearing on chlorine bomb use presented contradictory pictures.
abstract: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons, group overseeing destruction of Syria's chemical arms stockpile, reports almost all effluent from neutralized weapons has been eliminated; news is received with outrage by critics condemning Syrian government for indiscriminate use of makeshift chlorine gas bombs that targeted rebels but killed many civilians during civil war.
lead_paragraph: News from the Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons and testimony at a House hearing on chlorine bomb use presented contradictory pictures.

headline.main: Claims of Syrian Chlorine Bombs Counter News of Progress on Chemical Arms
headline.print_headline: Reports of Chlorine Bombs Mar Progress in Syria Arms

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Organization for the Prohibition of Chemical Weapons
